text: @BeingSalmanKhan @CMOMaharashtra @mybmc @AUThackeray @Iamrahulkanal Fanwar is a different thing but on this social issue i respect your words..🙏 don't abuse him guys #coronavirus is not going to ask you who is ur fav actor..plz appreciate for this nice initiative for spreading awareness 🙏👍
